author: IGN
description: Nintendo has taken the unprecedented decision to delay Switch 2 pre-orders in the U.S., blaming the impact of Trump’s tariffs and “evolving market conditions.” There was already a backlash about the price of the Switch 2 and certain games -- Mario Kart World, in particular. What if Nintendo has to increase its prices even further?
title: Switch 2 Pre-Order Delay: Who’s To Blame? - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out trailer for the anime, The Rose of Versailles. Streaming on Netflix April 30! For everyone who once admired those lovely roses...That heart-pounding excitement is brought back to life.

This tale of romance and fate unfolds during the turbulent French Revolution vividly bringing to life the world of Oscar — a beautiful woman raised as a boy by a distinguished general — and an ensemble of unforgettable characters. Set in the prosperous late 18th century, they embrace their destinies with grace and beauty, despite being swept along by the times. In an era of restrictions, Oscar defies the societal limits of status and gender, choosing her own path and bravely leaping into the French Revolution.
title: The Rose of Versailles - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Lilo & Stitch is the wildly funny and touching story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family. The film is directed by award-winning filmmaker Dean Fleischer Camp, with a screenplay by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright and Mike Van Waes, and stars Sydney Elizebeth Agudong, Billy Magnussen, Tia Carrere, Hannah Waddingham, Chris Sanders, with Courtney B. Vance, and Zach Galifianakis, and introducing Maia Kealoha. Lilo & Stitch is produced by Jonathan Eirich, p.g.a. and Dan Lin, with Tom Peitzman, Ryan Halprin, Louie Provost, Thomas Schumacher serving as executive producers. 
Lilo & Stitch opens exclusively in theaters nationwide May 23, 2025.
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official Mayhem Unleashed Teaser Trailer (2025) Maia Kealoha

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Marvel Rivals trailer for the superhero team-based PVP shooter game to see what to expect with the Season 2 Battle Pass: Flower of Krakoa, featuring 10 new costumes and exclusive cosmetics. Marvel Rivals is available now on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PS5, and Xbox Series X/S. Season 2 of Marvel Rivals begins on April 11, 2025.

In the wake of the Timestream Entanglement, the Quiet Council has convened, and the fate of Krakoa rests on a single extravagant night - The Hellfire Gala. With Emma Frost at the helm, Mutants and allies gather to re-establish their power, forge new alliances, and reshape their destiny.
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Season 2 Battle Pass: Flower of Krakoa Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get ready to throw down, retro warriors — Tough Guy is here to bring the heat back to your Sega Genesis. Check out the Tough Guy Fighting Spirits teaser trailer to learn more about this new fighting game, coming to Sega Genesis. A Kickstarter campaign for Tough Guy Fighting Spirits is available now.
title: Tough Guy Fighting Spirits - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
TO BE HERO X begins streaming on Crunchyroll on Saturday, April 5 at 5:30 PM PT, new episodes weekly.

In a world full of brilliant heroes, it’s the trust of fans that turns heroes into superheroes. If a hero loses the people’s trust, they lose their special abilities. Trust value is collected, quantified, and used to determine a hero’s ranking, displayed on their wrist. Every two years, the top heroes go to a tournament to fight, determine new trust values, and earn their rankings.
title: TO BE HERO X - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
GUILTY GEAR STRIVE: DUAL RULERS begins streaming on Crunchyroll on Saturday, April 5 at 7:00 AM PT, new episodes weekly.

Sin Kiske, the forbidden child of a human and a magically crafted biological weapon called a Gear, lives in a world where magic has replaced science, and scars from the Gear rebellion remain. Attending his parents’ taboo-breaking wedding, he encounters a mysterious girl with deep hatred for Gears, and their fateful meeting threatens to upend the world once again.
title: Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

Unlock Serket's secret as she sweeps the competition, using sandstorms and the magic of the desert to her advantage. Harness the power of sand as you leave your enemies to dust! FragPunk is available now on PC, with Xbox Series X/S and PS5 (PlayStation 5) to follow.

#FragPunk #Gaming #Games
title: FragPunk - Official Serket Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The games industry thrives on evolution. From the transformative power of new advanced technologies like AI to the rise of transmedia as a new frontier for IP growth, the possibilities are endless. But will these advancements deliver the profound impact they promise? The industry is known for being at the forefront of innovation and strategy - the early adopters - but does it always translate to success, and what can we learn from past missteps to navigate the future?

In this #DICE2025 talk, Laura Naviaux Sturr, Amazon Games’ GM of Operations, shares some of the most critical, learn-from moments she’s experienced during her more than 25-year tenure in the industry. This session provides a candid look at what went wrong, what was fixed (or not), and how those learnings have shaped her approach to long-term success in games. Whether you’re navigating today’s trends or planning for what’s next for your company, this session offers a valuable lens for working toward a more resilient gam
title: Learning from the Past to Shape the Future of Games - Laura Naviaux Sturr, Amazon Games | DICE 2025

author: IGN
description:

Lost Skies will be available on PC on April 18, 2025. Find and craft ancient technology, build your own skyship, brave ferocious storms, and battle giant threats that await beyond the horizon in Lost Skies.

#IGN #Gaming

Metroid 4 is looking great and we can't wait for it to launch!

author: IGN
description:
One of the most important advancements in video game development in recent years is ray tracing ⁠– the seemingly magical technology that renders light in games resulting in stunning detail and graphics. We asked Digital Foundry’s Alex Battaglia to use his expertise and explain this technology to three levels of gamer. Sponsored by NVIDIA.

You can get the hardware used in this video by following the links below:
AWD-IT 3500X RGB Ryzen 7 7700X 8 Core Nvidia RTX 5080 16GB PC: https://bit.ly/3G4pt93 
ASUS ROG Swift PG27UCDM 27" 4K UHD 240Hz G-SYNC Compatible HDR10 QD-OLED Gaming Monitor: https://bit.ly/42lOh47 

Alex Battaglia has been working at Digital Foundry analysing PC releases for performance and features since 2018, specialising in explaining graphics techniques and rooting out the cause for persistent performance issues. Outside of Digital Foundry, Alex has done graphics and performance consulting for AAA games.

#Nvidia #Gaming #RayTracing
title: Expert Explains Ray Tracing to Three Levels of Gamer

Players will unravel a long-standing mystery and face the Outer Gods once and for all. Use a variety of weapons in combat and make dialogue choices to uncover dark secrets surrounding a coming catastrophe. Stygian: Outer Gods is running an open beta on April 4 through April 7 with the game launching into Eary Access on April 14 via Steam for PC.

Here's your look at Two Strikes in this trailer for the upcoming hand-drawn 2D fighting game inspired by the Sengoku period, blending traditional Japanese art with intense, fast-paced duels. Two Strikes is currently available in Early Access on Steam, with a full launch on PC, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on April 25, 2025. A mobile version will follow soon on Crunchyroll Game Vault.

#Crunchyroll #Gaming #MobileGaming

author: IGN
description:
Meet Emma Frost - The White Queen and see the character in action in this latest Marvel Rivals trailer for the superhero team-based PVP shooter game. Marvel Rivals is available now on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PS5, and Xbox Series X/S. Season 2: Hellfire Gala of Marvel Rivals kicks off on April 11, 2025 (UTC).

Emma Frost of Krakoa’s Quiet Council cordially invites you to attend the grand return of the Hellfire Gala! With the timelines in complete disarray and Mutantkind scattered, the White Queen reignites her annual celebration to welcome allies old and new to the living island.

A wealthy socialite, fashion icon, and powerful telepath, Emma Frost uses her Mutant abilities to dominate her foes while executing on the vision of a protected home for Mutantkind.

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #Games
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Emma Frost: The White Queen Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week we have Jada Griffin, Sam Claiborn, and Bo Moore joining Daemon as they take a look at the Nintendo Switch 2. It's more powerful, can run more games, and will cost you more money. Is the new hybrid console worth $450 for the base model? And will the new Mario Kart World be worth a whopping $80 alone? Plus we have a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

This episode of Next-Gen Console Watch was produced by Daemon Hatfield and Jobert Atienza. Technical direction is by Jobert Atienza, with technical production by Marhyan Franzen and Amir Rakib. Audio engineering is handled by Amir Rakib. Post-production editing is by Jobert Atienza, and graphic design is by Justin Vachon. 

Next-Gen Console Watch is an IGN production and part of the Geek Media Network.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Looks Awesome & Pricey - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
One of the reasons the MCU has been so successful over the years is that this shared universe leans heavily on the comic book source material. These movies aren’t usually direct adaptations of any one comic, but they always draw on iconic storylines and runs and make that classic material accessible to a wider audience. Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars will be no exceptions. These upcoming movies are inspired by both the original 1984 crossover Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars and 2015’s Secret Wars. 

But that’s just the tip of the iceberg. Now that we know the main cast of Avengers: Doomsday, we’re getting a clearer picture of which Marvel Comics storylines are inspiring this epic MCU adventure. From epic crossovers like Avengers vs. X-Men to the debut of the Illuminati to two different versions of Secret Wars, these are the 75 Marvel comics that give us a better idea of what Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars are about. 

Avengers: Doomsday is directed by the
title: The 75 Comics Doomsday Will Pull From (According to the Avengers Cast Reveal)

author: IGN
description:
South of Midnight reviewed by Michael Higham on PC, also available on Xbox Series X|S.

South of Midnight is a straightforward but well-executed action-adventure game on the surface, with a simple but satisfying mix of combat and platforming. It’s focused, filling out its 12-hour runtime nicely without ever dragging or relying on unnecessary padding. Beyond those basics, however, is a certain heart and artistry that elevates the whole package, inviting you to peer into the deep American South through its folklore, nature, and culture. It might not be the most profound exploration of family life, but it’s delivered in ways that feel authentic. From its striking art style to the evocative tunes that bring big story moments together, Hazel’s journey is a captivating one no matter where you’re from.
title: South of Midnight Review
